metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19035 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
jhead 3.03 is affected by: heap-based buffer over-read. The impact is:Denial of service. The component is: ReadJpegSections and process_SOFn injpgfile.c. The attack vector is: Open a specially crafted JPEG file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19035` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

jhead - 1:3.00-8~ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jhead package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.00-8~ubuntu0.1').
